parameters.name: AlertSetting
parameters.description: The alert settings. Valid value: INHERITED, which indicates that the Cloud Backup client sends alert notifications by using the same method configured for the backup vault.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the SAP HANA instance.

parameters.name: HanaName
parameters.description: The name of the SAP HANA instance.

parameters.name: Host
parameters.description: The private or internal IP address of the host where the primary node of the SAP HANA instance resides.

parameters.name: InstanceNumber
parameters.description: The instance number of the SAP HANA system.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The password that is used to connect with the SAP HANA database.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: UseSsl
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to connect with the SAP HANA database over Secure Sockets Layer (SSL). Valid values:

*   true: The SAP HANA database is connected over SSL.
*   false: The SAP HANA database is not connected over SSL.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: The username of the SYSTEMDB database.

parameters.name: ValidateCertificate
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to verify the SSL certificate of the SAP HANA database. Valid values:

*   true: The SSL certificate of the SAP HANA database is verified.
*   false: The SSL certificate of the SAP HANA database is not verified.

parameters.name: VaultId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup vault.
